title: Impeachment...Over?, Groundhogs dA.I. 1.31.20
itunes:title: Impeachment...Over?, Groundhogs dA.I. 1.31.20
description:
In episode 560, Jack and Miles are joined by Behind The Bastards / Worst Year Ever / It Could Happen Here podcast host Robert Evans to discuss the new emojis, impeachment updates, WHO declaring an international public health emergency over the coronavirus, scientists discovering why stress causes grey hair, Trump's wall falling apart due to wind, PETA wanting Punxsutawney Phil to retire, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. PSA: New food emoji are coming
  2. Impeachment state of play: Senate Republicans on brink of bringing trial to an end
  3. WHO Declares Coronavirus Outbreak a Global Public Health Emergency
  4. Coronavirus: French Asians hit back at racism with 'I'm not a virus'
  5. Secretary Wilbur Ross says coronavirus will be good for [checks notes] American jobs: "I think it will help to accelerate the return of jobs to North America."
  6. Scientists discover 'why stress turns hair white'
  7. Trump border wall between US and Mexico blows over in high winds
  8. Punxsutawney Phil should be replaced with AI groundhog, says PETA
  9. WATCH: Naomi & Kate - Coco & Clair Clair

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
